title: Architectural Design Collaboration Competency Enhancement Program Using the Vertical Studio Model

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational architectural design principles and CAD software proficiency
context.additional_context: An online intensive workshop for undergraduate architecture majors, applying a modified vertical studio model to strengthen competencies in mathematical design principles and real-world project implementation.

learning_goals: Learners can develop design concepts in three or more ways based on peer feedback in a vertical studio environment.
Learners can apply mathematical tools such as the Pythagorean theorem and trigonometric functions to real projects for optimizing spatial structures.
Learners can establish and implement role division and knowledge-sharing strategies within cluster groups.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
